function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to implement a nationwide lockdown","Impact":"Increase in infected and death cases","Mitigation":"Implementing strict lockdown measures to restrict movement and social interaction","Technologies":"Public health campaign, surveillance and monitoring systems","People":"General public","Owner":"Government"},{"Description":"Lack of vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for COVID-19","Impact":"Inability to treat infected individuals and prevent spread","Mitigation":"Investing in vaccine and antiviral treatment research and development","Technologies":"Biotechnology, medical research, pharmaceuticals","People":"Scientific research community, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Government, private sector"},{"Description":"Ineffective adherence to social distancing measures","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Public education and awareness, enforcement of social distancing regulations","Technologies":"Information and communication technology, surveillance systems","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, law enforcement"}]}
